inclusion.criterion: admitted to telemetry ward and emergency department
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient was admitted earlier today evaluation of syncope and ventricular arrhythmias

exclusion.criterion: patients with R wave less than 0.5 millivolts.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with functioning Internal Cardiac Device.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: The patient was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.

exclusion.criterion: patients with cardiac pacemakers if oversensing by AECD is demonstrated (double counting of pacer spikes).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with visible chest lesions that would prevent AECD pad placement.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients who are designated Do Not Resuscitate.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope.
